analyzed: rdo rje me dang nyi ma 'bar ba la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: Homage to the blazing vajra sun.

original: rdo rje me dang nyi ma 'bar ba sku mdog mthing ga 'bar ba'i phreng ba 'khrigs pa'i 'od can /
analyzed: rdo rje me dang nyi ma 'bar ba sku mdog mthing ga 'bar ba'i phreng ba 'khrigs pa'i 'od can /
translated: Vajra Blazing Sun, blue in color, with light radiating from a mass of blazing flames.

original: zhal bzhi pa /
analyzed: zhal bzhi pa /
translated: He has four faces.

original: phyag brgyad pa /
analyzed: phyag brgyad pa /
translated: He has eight arms.

original: sgeg pa dang / dpa' ba dang / 'jigs pa dang / snying rje'i nyams dang ldan pa'i zhabs bzhi pa /
analyzed: sgeg pa dang / dpa' ba dang / 'jigs pa dang / snying rje'i nyams dang ldan pa'i zhabs bzhi pa /
translated: He has four legs in the poses of dancing and is endowed with the expressions of grace, heroism, fear, and compassion.

original: g-yas kyi phyag bzhis rdo rje dang / ral gri dang / 'khor lo dang / mda' bsnams pa /
analyzed: g-yas kyi phyag bzhis rdo rje dang / ral gri dang / 'khor lo dang / mda' bsnams pa /
translated: The four right hands hold a vajra, sword, chakram, and arrow.

original: g-yon gyi phyag bzhis dril bu dang / gzhu dang / zhags pa dang / kha tv'am ga ba dan sna tshogs pa dang bcas pa bsnams pa /
analyzed: g-yon gyi phyag bzhis dril bu dang / gzhu dang / zhags pa dang / kha tv'am ga ba dan sna tshogs pa dang bcas pa bsnams pa /
translated: The four left hands hold a bell, bow, noose, and khaṭvāṅga with a variegated banner.

original: dbu skra skya bo'i tshogs me 'bar ba can /
analyzed: dbu skra skya bo'i tshogs me 'bar ba can /
translated: His hair is blazing white.

original: shin tu 'jigs pa sbrul chen po 'khyil bas lag gdub dang / rked rgyan dang / rkang gdub dang / mgul rgyan dang / rna rgyan dang / cod pan du brgyan pa /
analyzed: shin tu 'jigs pa sbrul chen po 'khyil bas lag gdub dang / rked rgyan dang / rkang gdub dang / mgul rgyan dang / rna rgyan dang / cod pan du brgyan pa /
translated: He is very frightening, adorned with bracelets, a belt, anklets, a necklace, earrings, and a head ornament made of great coiling snakes.

original: sgyu ma chen po'i 'khor lor byas pa bzhi la chung ma dang bcas pa'i khyab 'jug g-yas brkyang ba'i zhabs kyis mnan pa dbang du byed pa bsgom par bya'o //
analyzed: sgyu ma chen po'i 'khor lor byas pa bzhi la chung ma dang bcas pa'i khyab 'jug g-yas brkyang ba'i zhabs kyis mnan pa dbang du byed pa bsgom par bya'o //
translated: He is trampling on the four who are the wheel of great illusion, along with their wives, with his right leg extended.

original: de nas phyag rgya bcing bar bya ste /
analyzed: de nas phyag rgya bcing bar bya ste /
translated: Then one should bind the consort.

original: lag mthil rdo rje bcings pa'i sor mo 'bar ba'i snying bo'i dbus su mthe bong gnyis blang bar bya'o //
analyzed: lag mthil rdo rje bcings pa'i sor mo 'bar ba'i snying bo'i dbus su mthe bong gnyis blang bar bya'o //
translated: The fingers of the vajra fist in the palm of the hand are the essence of the blazing fire. One should raise up the two thumbs.

original: de nas sngags bzlas par bya ste /
analyzed: de nas sngags bzlas par bya ste /
translated: Then one should recite the mantra.

original: aom badzra dzva l'a na l'arka h'um zhes so //
analyzed: aom badzra dzva l'a na l'arka h'um zhes so //
translated: Oṃ vajra jvālānalā arka hūṃ.

original: rdo rje me dang nyi ma 'bar ba'i sgrub thabs rdzogs so //
analyzed: rdo rje me dang nyi ma 'bar ba'i sgrub thabs rdzogs so //
translated: The sādhana of Vajra Fire and Blazing Sun is complete.
